name: Polimi on Fire!
description:
Hi, welcome to the typical READ.ME file :)

Our develop team have created this game for you to enjoy on your Windows and Mac devices. Here you will be able to experience how would you escape from Polimi.

We encourage you to read the OPTIONS->COMMANDS for you to know the controls of the game.

Oh and please don't burn Polimi in real life even if you love the game ;)
